meanings.sent1: The fetor from the garbage can made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The fetor of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The fetor in the bathroom was so bad, we had to use air freshener.
meanings.sent4: The fetor of failure hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The fetor of decay lingered in the old cellar.

meanings.sent1: The trash bin fetors in the summer heat.
meanings.sent2: The flowers fetor when they start to wilt.
meanings.sent3: The socks fetor after a long day of hiking.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen fetors of burnt toast.
meanings.sent5: The alleyway fetors of old fish.
